title: EconoMe
description: A dynamic budgeting app created using React, Node.js, and MongoDB. This full-stack application allows users to track expenses, set budgets, and visualize spending patterns.

title: StaffSync
description: A comprehensive employee management system built with Node.js and MySQL. This application demonstrates proficiency in database CRUD operations and RESTful API design.

title: eNotes
description: A note-taking application showcasing backend development skills with RESTful API implementation. Users can create, read, update, and delete notes efficiently.

title: Mongoose Mind Map
description: An interactive mind mapping tool built with MongoDB and Mongoose. This project demonstrates proficiency in NoSQL database design and management.

title: TTRPG-Inventory-Bot BotOfHolding
description: A Discord bot designed to manage inventories for tabletop RPG games. This group project showcases collaboration skills and proficiency in working with external APIs.

title: GeneratingSteamHeat
description: A command-line README generator that streamlines the process of creating professional project documentation. This tool demonstrates proficiency in Node.js and command-line applications.

title: Forecaster
description: A weather forecasting application that integrates multiple third-party APIs to provide accurate and up-to-date weather information. This project showcases skills in API integration and asynchronous JavaScript.

title: Time Series Analysis with Prophet
description: This project involves analyzing and forecasting search trends data for MercadoLibre, an e-commerce platform, using Facebook's Prophet library for time series analysis. The project focuses on identifying trends, seasonality, and correlations between search traffic and stock price patterns.

title: Student Loan Risk Assessment Neural Network
description: This project implements a neural network model to assess student loan risk and recommend loan options. Using TensorFlow/Keras, the system analyzes various student attributes to predict credit rankings and provide personalized loan recommendations. Features include data preprocessing, model evaluation, and context-based filtering for loan recommendations, with export/import functionality for trained models.

title: SMS Spam Detection Project
description: A machine learning project to detect spam SMS messages using a Support Vector Machine (SVM) model and TF-IDF vectorization. The project features a Gradio web interface for easy testing, including enhanced preprocessing for better spam detection. It highlights the challenges of improving accuracy by refining text preprocessing and adjusting the model's sensitivity to spam indicators.
